医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
莱姆病症状和结果的性别差异与男性相比，患有莱姆病的女性需要更长的时间才能得到诊断，症状更严重，残疾率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Sex-based-differences-in-Lyme-disease-symptoms-and-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Sex-based-differences-in-Lyme-disease-symptoms-and-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c1cb5db-5827-4102-9a8e-98a97799ae95 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 14:15:55 -0400 Sex-based differences in Lyme disease symptoms and outcomes
为 80 岁以上老人设立的新急诊室减少了等待时间根据诺福克和诺维奇大学医院 (NNUH) 以及东安格利亚大学 (UEA) 的研究，该国第一个针对 80 多岁老人的急诊科的成立导致急诊室花费的时间显着减少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-emergency-department-for-over-80s-reduces-wait-times.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-emergency-department-for-over-80s-reduces-wait-times.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bae95e26-0a47-43ea-aa44-439977ebfb48 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 13:44:37 -0400 New emergency department for over 80s reduces wait times
介导 SARS-CoV-2 无症状感染的常见遗传变异您有没有想过为什么有些人从未患过 COVID-19？今天发表在《自然》杂志上的一项研究表明，人与人之间常见的遗传变异是介导 SARS-CoV-2 无症状感染的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Common-genic-variation-responsible-for-mediating-SARS-CoV-2-asymptomatic-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Common-genic-variation-responsible-for-mediating-SARS-CoV-2-asymptomatic-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7bf074a-3780-4fee-8594-a97d76fcba86 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 13:37:11 -0400 Common genetic variation responsible for mediating SARS-CoV-2 asymptomatic infection
神经科学家发现新的脑细胞有助于纠正导航错误在日常生活中的常规导航过程中，我们的大脑使用空间映射和记忆来引导我们从 A 点到 B 点。就像例行公事一样：在导航中犯了错误，需要进行航向修正。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Neuroscientists-discover-new-brain-cells-that-help- Correct-navigational-errors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Neuroscientists-discover-new-brain-cells-that-help- Correct-navigational-errors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed202aae-5167-4847-90fd-e4a7e0419437 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 13:27:00 -0400 Neuroscientists discover new brain cells that help correct navigational errors
研究显示青少年自杀率的季节性高峰出现在四月和十月2016 年至 2021 年间，全国范围内青少年自杀（包括自残、自杀意念和自杀未遂）的发生率有所增加； 4 月和 10 月处于季节性高峰；根据 UTHealth 休斯顿的研究，当学校在 COVID-19 大流行期间关闭时，这一数字处于最低水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Seasonal-peaks-in-teen-suicidality-occur-in-April-and-October-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Seasonal-peaks-in-teen-suicidality-occur-in-April-and-October-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4f492d3-f035-4a15-9dc9-76a3dbbd2293 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 13:19:36 -0400 Seasonal peaks in teen suicidality occur in April and October, research shows
Arrayjet 宣布与 Chemspace 合作，增强其用于药物发现的小分子微阵列服务领先的喷墨液体处理解决方案提供商 Arrayjet 今天宣布，它已与最大的小分子和生物制剂在线目录 Chemspace 合作，以增强和简化该公司的小分子微阵列 (SMM) 服务产品。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Arrayjet-announces-collaboration-with-Chemspace-to-augment-its-small-molecule-microarray-services-for-drug-discovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Arrayjet-announces-collaboration-with-Chemspace-to-augment-its-small-molecule-microarray-services-for-drug-discovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=056c3a0b-95de-4483-b34b-006f5c5911bc Wed, 19 Jul 2023 13:05:00 -0400 Arrayjet announces collaboration with Chemspace to augment its small molecule microarray services for drug discovery
新的肾组织图谱可以促进对肾损伤和疾病的了解圣路易斯华盛顿大学医学院的研究人员帮助领导了一项由美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 资助的重大研究，该研究发现了健康和患病肾脏中丰富的细胞和分子多样性，创建了肾脏组织图谱，这将有助于进一步了解肾脏损伤和疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-kidney-tissue-atlas-could-advance-understanding-of-kidney-injury-and-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/New-kidney-tissue-atlas-could-advance-understanding-of-kidney-injury-and-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39fa3ac7-4420-4d77-bd42-b41226ddfcf8 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 12:51:46 -0400 New kidney tissue atlas could advance understanding of kidney injury and disease
研究为Dmc1丝组装机制提供新见解同源重组 (HR) 是一个重要过程，在减数分裂（一种专门用于有性生殖的细胞周期）过程中发挥着多种关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-mechanism-of-Dmc1-filament- assembly.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Study-provides-new-insights-into-the-mechanism-of-Dmc1-filament- assembly.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b0e0e01-c6ec-48e5-93f7-abc1b8ecdf4b Wed, 19 Jul 2023 12:38:37 -0400 Study provides new insights into the mechanism of Dmc1 filament assembly
研究人员首次实现克级规模合成坦泽酸 B 1928年抗生素的发现是医学史上的一个重大转折点。自人类文明诞生以来，医生第一次获得了一种极其强大且有效的工具来对抗各种细菌感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Researchers-achieve-first-ever-gram-scale-synthesis-of-tanzawaic-acid-B.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Researchers-achieve-first-ever-gram-scale-synthesis-of-tanzawaic-acid-B.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=39ebe81e-66ba-43e1-a918-1ff61423229e Wed, 19 Jul 2023 12:25:49 -0400 Researchers achieve first-ever gram-scale synthesis of tanzawaic acid B
基于深度学习的手持设备改善心房颤动检测宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。症状驱动的心电图（ECG）记录在检测消融后心房颤动复发（AFR）方面发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Deep-learning-based-handheld-device-improves-atrial-fibrillation-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230719/Deep-learning-based-handheld-device-improves-atrial-fibrillation-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2153b090-01a8-43f0-b330-01796e4f9fe9 Wed, 19 Jul 2023 12:10:13 -0400
